title: San Pedro Pirates FC
text:
San Pedro Pirates Football Club is a <a href="Belize">Belize</a>an <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team.
The team is based in <a href="San%20Pedro%20Town">San Pedro Town</a>. Their home stadium is <a href="Ambergris%20Stadium">Ambergris Stadium</a>.
The team competed in the <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20Premier%20League%20of%20Belize">2017–18</a> edition of the <a href="Premier%20League%20of%20Belize">Premier League of Belize</a> for the first time.
